diff:
# Patch: Update Corruption ratio from 28.6% to 30.0%
# Spreadsheet: example-spreadsheet-123
# Total cells to modify: 4

--- Abloom Build A!B5
+++ Abloom Build A!B5
- =ROUND(B3*SWITCH(TRIM(B4),"Corruption",28.6%,...
+ =ROUND(B3*SWITCH(TRIM(B4),"Corruption",30.0%,...

--- Abloom Build B!B5
+++ Abloom Build B!B5
- =ROUND(B3*SWITCH(TRIM(B4),"Corruption",28.6%,...
+ =ROUND(B3*SWITCH(TRIM(B4),"Corruption",30.0%,...

--- Pyre Build!D8
+++ Pyre Build!D8
- =ROUND(D6*SWITCH(TRIM(D7),"Corruption",28.6%,...
+ =ROUND(D6*SWITCH(TRIM(D7),"Corruption",30.0%,...

--- Calculations!B2
+++ Calculations!B2
- =28.6%
+ =30.0%
